import {BsDot} from 'react-icons/bs' import NxtThemeContext from '../../Context' import { ThumbnailContainer, ThumbnailImage, ThumbnailTextContainer, ChannelLogo, Title, Name, ViewsAndTimeContainer, } from './StyledComponents' const VideoThumbnail = props => { const {details} = props return ( {value => { const {isDarkTheme} = value const theme = isDarkTheme ? 'dark' : '' return (
{details.title} {details.channel.name} {details.viewCount} views {details.publishedAt}
) }} ) } export default VideoThumbnail
